Uses of Package
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts

  • Packages that use org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies
    The package provides classes that implement policies for a Datacenter to select a Host to place or migrate a VM, based on some criteria defined by each class.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters
    The package provides Datacenter implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts
    The package provides Host implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists
    The package provides a set of helper class to manage lists of different objects such as Hosts, VMs, Cloudlets and PEs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.vm
    The package provides VmScheduler implementations that are used to schedule the execution of multiple Vm inside a given Host.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms
    The package provide Vm implementations.
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    The package provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantianting multiple simulation objects more easily.
    org.cloudsimplus.listeners
    The package includes EventListener implementations to provide event notification for simulations.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies 
    Class and Description
    Host
    An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Physical Machines (Hosts) features.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power 
    Class and Description
    Host
    An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Physical Machines (Hosts) features.

  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts 
    Class and Description
    Host
    An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Physical Machines (Hosts) features.
    HostDynamicWorkload
    An interface to be implemented by Host classes that provide dynamic workloads.
    HostSimple
    A Host class that implements the most basic features of a Physical Machine (PM) inside a Datacenter.
    HostStateHistoryEntry
    Stores historic data about a host.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.network 
    Class and Description
    Host
    An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Physical Machines (Hosts) features.
    HostSimple
    A Host class that implements the most basic features of a Physical Machine (PM) inside a Datacenter.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.power 
    Class and Description
    Host
    An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Physical Machines (Hosts) features.
    HostDynamicWorkload
    An interface to be implemented by Host classes that provide dynamic workloads.
    HostDynamicWorkloadSimple
    A host supporting dynamic workloads and performance degradation.
    HostSimple
    A Host class that implements the most basic features of a Physical Machine (PM) inside a Datacenter.
